PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02492020-04-10,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that the existing ticketing schemes of each of Alberta and Saskatchewan applies integrally and adequately to federal contraventions committed within those jurisdictions, excluding provincial provisions, which will provide a ticketing option to enforce offences of the Quarantine Act that are designated as contraventions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0087 Publication Date: 2020-04-29
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that the existing ticketing schemes of each of Alberta and Saskatchewan applies integrally and adequately to federal contraventions committed within those jurisdictions, excluding provincial provisions, which will provide a ticketing option to enforce offences of the Quarantine Act that are designated as contraventions.
